featured.text: “Judo helped me a small boat that held 20 people and set sail into the by giving me serenity, discipline, commitment— deep waters of the Aegean Sea.
Research also suggests that firstborn children generally become more conservative than other children because they receive most of the parental discipline.

definition.zh_def: 紀律；訓練或控制行為的方式
definition.en_def: A system of rules and regulations that governs behavior; training to improve skills or behavior.
definition.example: She showed great discipline in her studies, always completing her assignments on time.
